headline: War Continues in Ukraine, Governor Takes Action
author: Jim Michaels
sentences: Governor Mike DeWine ordered 6400 bottles of Russia-distilled vodka taken off the shelves at state liquor agencies over the weekend.
DeWine also declared Sunday a Day of Prayer, attending Mass at St Andrew Ukrainian Catholic Church in Parma.
PARMA, Ohio (News Talk 1480 WHBC) â€“ Supporting Ukraine means no drinking Russian vodka in Ohio.
The vodka is sold under the brand names Green Mark and Russian Standard.
U.S Senator Rob Portman also attended services in the Cleveland suburb.
